dataset_info.name: portrait-demo
dataset_info.license: CC0 or properly licensed stock photos

exclude: Features you want the LoRA to learn

example_captions.caption: ohwx woman wearing professional black business suit in modern office, natural window lighting, confident pose
ohwx woman in casual white summer dress at outdoor cafe, relaxed sitting pose, soft afternoon light
ohwx woman with winter coat and knit scarf in snowy park, walking pose, overcast lighting
ohwx woman in elegant evening gown at upscale restaurant, seated at table, warm ambient lighting
ohwx woman wearing athletic activewear in modern gym, standing near equipment, bright fluorescent lighting
ohwx woman in denim jacket and jeans on city street, walking pose, golden hour sunset lighting
ohwx woman wearing cozy sweater in home library, reading book in armchair, soft lamp lighting
ohwx woman in swimsuit on tropical beach, standing near ocean waves, bright midday sunlight
ohwx woman wearing leather jacket in urban alley, leaning against brick wall, dramatic side lighting
ohwx woman in professional chef attire in restaurant kitchen, working at counter, bright overhead lighting
ohwx woman wearing hiking gear on mountain trail, walking with backpack, natural outdoor lighting
ohwx woman in vintage dress at antique bookstore, browsing shelves, soft natural window light
ohwx woman wearing lab coat in modern laboratory, working with equipment, bright fluorescent lighting
ohwx woman in bohemian outfit at outdoor music festival, dancing pose, warm evening lighting
ohwx woman wearing business casual attire in home office, working at desk, natural window lighting

prompt_testing_suggestions.test_prompt: ohwx woman in formal business attire, corporate boardroom background, professional lighting
prompt_testing_suggestions.expected_result: Should show your trained subject in business context not in training data

prompt_testing_suggestions.test_prompt: ohwx woman at sunset beach, flowing summer dress, golden hour lighting, photorealistic
prompt_testing_suggestions.expected_result: Should generalize to beach setting with appropriate styling

prompt_testing_suggestions.test_prompt: ohwx woman in winter clothing, snowy forest, soft natural light, high quality
ohwx woman portrait, studio lighting, professional photography, detailed
prompt_testing_suggestions.expected_result: Clean studio portrait showing character consistency

prompt_testing_suggestions.test_prompt: ohwx woman in cafe, reading newspaper, cozy atmosphere, warm lighting, realistic
prompt_testing_suggestions.expected_result: Casual lifestyle scene, should maintain character identity

usage_instructions.step_1: Create .txt files with same name as images (image_001.txt, image_002.txt, etc.)
usage_instructions.step_2: Copy the caption text from this JSON into each .txt file
usage_instructions.step_3: Verify all captions include the trigger word 'ohwx woman'
usage_instructions.step_4: Place images and captions in data/datasets/portrait-demo/
usage_instructions.step_5: Follow GETTING-STARTED.md to create training job

quality_checklist: All captions start with trigger word 'ohwx woman'
Captions describe clothing, location, lighting - NOT facial features
No duplicate or near-duplicate image descriptions
